short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An index of subreddits based around professions to help you find a niche.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you trying to find a niche community to serve? Reddit contains hundreds of communities where you can find professionals talking about their job: their day to day needs, their frustrations, and their desires.  Here you will easily find your market.  PSR has collected hundreds of links to these profession-based subreddits.
